abilities.name: Insanity.
abilities.description: The derro has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
abilities.description: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The derro is a 5th-level spellcaster. It's spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The derro knows the following sorcerer spells:
Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, mage hand, message, ray of frost
1st level (4 slots): burning hands, chromatic orb, sleep
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, spider climb
3rd level (2 slots): blink, lightning bolt
